name: ressbasss
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3

body.origin:
|- wss(cfv(cbs, c0), c1)
-| wi(wcel(c3, universe), wss(cfv(cbs, c0), c1))
-| wi(wn(wcel(c3, universe)), wss(cfv(cbs, c0), c1))
body.pretty:
⊢ (Base ` c0)⊆ c1
⊣ (c3 ∈ 𝕌 →(Base ` c0)⊆ c1)
⊣ (¬ c3 ∈ 𝕌 →(Base ` c0)⊆ c1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wss(cfv(cbs, c0), c1)
-| wi(wcel(c3, universe), wss(cfv(cbs, c0), c1))
-| wi(wn(wcel(c3, universe)), wss(cfv(cbs, c0), c1))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (Base ` c0)⊆ c1
⊣ (c3 ∈ 𝕌 →(Base ` c0)⊆ c1)
⊣ (¬ c3 ∈ 𝕌 →(Base ` c0)⊆ c1)

stmt.pretty: syl6eqssr((Base ` c0), c1, (c3 ⋂ c1), c3 ∈ 𝕌)

-| wss(cin(c3, c1), c1)

body.origin:

-| wceq(c0, co(c2, cress, c3))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c2))

cumulated.origin:

stmt.origin: syl6eqss(cfv(cbs, c0), c1, cfv(cbs, emptycls), wn(wcel(c3, universe)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wn(wcel(c3, universe)), wss(cfv(cbs, c0), c1))
-| wi(wn(wcel(c3, universe)), wceq(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, emptycls)))
-| wss(cfv(cbs, emptycls), c1)
body.pretty:
⊢ (¬ c3 ∈ 𝕌 →(Base ` c0)⊆ c1)
⊣ (¬ c3 ∈ 𝕌 →(Base ` c0)=(Base ` ∅))
⊣ (Base ` ∅)⊆ c1

cumulated.origin:
|- wss(cfv(cbs, c0), c1)
-| wceq(c0, co(c2, cress, c3))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c2))
-| wi(wn(wcel(c3, universe)), wceq(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, emptycls)))
-| wss(cfv(cbs, emptycls), c1)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (Base ` c0)⊆ c1
⊣ c0 =(c2[|`s]c3)
⊣ c1 =(Base ` c2)
⊣ (¬ c3 ∈ 𝕌 →(Base ` c0)=(Base ` ∅))
⊣ (Base ` ∅)⊆ c1

body.origin:

comment: The base set of a restriction is a subset of the base set of the original structure. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 27-Nov-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 30-Apr-2015.)
